titles.title: A bill to direct the Secretary of the Interior to permit access across certain Federal lands in the State of Arkansas, and for other purposes.

action.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Energy and Natural Resources.
Referred to Subcommittee on Public Lands, National Parks.
Committee on Energy and Natural Resources requested executive comment from Interior Department, OMB.
Subcommittee on Public Lands, National Parks. Hearings held.
Committee on Energy and Natural Resources received executive comment from Interior Department. Unfavorable.

calendar.text: Committee on Energy and Natural Resources. Ordered to be reported with amendments favorably.

action.text: Committee on Energy and Natural Resources. Reported to Senate by Senator Johnston with amendments. With written report No. 100-176.

calendar.text: Placed on Senate Legislative Calendar under General Orders. Calendar No. 339.

vote.text: Passed Senate with amendments by Voice Vote.

action.text: Message on Senate action sent to the House.
Referred to House Committee on Interior and Insular Affairs.
Referred to Subcommittee on National Parks and Public Lands.
Subcommittee on National Parks and Public Lands Discharged.
Committee Consideration and Mark-up Session Held.
Reported to House by House Committee on Interior and Insular Affairs. Report No: 100-976.
Called up by House Under Suspension of Rules.

vetoed.text: Vetoed by President. Veto Message No: PM164.

action.text: Veto message received in Senate. Ordered held at the desk.

committee.subcommittee: Public Lands, National Parks and Forests
committee.name: Senate Energy and Natural Resources

bill.summary: 12/12/1987--Passed Senate amended. (Measure passed Senate, amended) Directs the Secretary of the Interior to permit access across the Buffalo National River (park), Arkansas, to certain owners of privately owned lands (as of September 1, 1987) outside the park on an annual fee basis.
